DOC.brief_summary: The objective one-day study evaluate clinical performance SofLens Daily Disposable lens compare market 1 Day Contact Lens .
DOC.brief_title: One-Day Dispensing Clinical Evaluation SofLens Daily Disposable Lenses Compared Marketed 1 Day Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Have physiologically normal anterior segment exhibit clinically significant biomicroscopy finding . Have active ocular disease allergic conjunctivitis . Not use topical ocular medication . Participating conflict study . Considered Investigator suitable candidate participation .
